==== Additional/Deducted Costs ====
 1. Hard Drive Sizes
  a. HD < 3GB = no added charge
## 3GB < HD < 6GB = add $5
## 6GB < HD < 10GB = add $10
## 10GB < HD < 20GB = add $20
# Integrated Sound System
  a. No additional cost if included
## Deduct $5 if not included
# Power Management
  a. No additional cost if included
## Deduct $5 if not included
# Screen Resolution
  a. 640x480 = deduct $5
## 800x600 = no added charge
## 1024x768 = add $5
